testsuite.name: CaffeineAutoConfiguration Integration Tests

testcase.name: Should configure Caffeine with maximum size
Should not load without Caffeine class
Should configure Caffeine with expire after write
Should configure Caffeine with combined spec
Should use default spec when not configured

testsuite.system-out: 18:57:17.465 [Test worker] INFO com.nexora.redis.autoconfigure.CaffeineAutoConfiguration -- Initializing CaffeineCacheManager with spec: maximumSize=500 18:57:17.494 [Test worker] INFO com.nexora.redis.autoconfigure.CaffeineAutoConfiguration -- Initializing CaffeineCacheManager with spec: maximumSize=1000,expireAfterWrite=5m 18:57:17.511 [Test worker] INFO com.nexora.redis.autoconfigure.CaffeineAutoConfiguration -- Initializing CaffeineCacheManager with spec: maximumSize=1000,expireAfterWrite=5m 18:57:17.526 [Test worker] INFO com.nexora.redis.autoconfigure.CaffeineAutoConfiguration -- Initializing CaffeineCacheManager with spec: expireAfterWrite=10m 18:57:17.540 [Test worker] INFO com.nexora.redis.autoconfigure.CaffeineAutoConfiguration -- Initializing CaffeineCacheManager with spec: maximumSize=1000,expireAfterWrite=5m 18:57:17.552 [Test worker] INFO com.nexora.redis.autoconfigure.CaffeineAutoConfiguration -- Initializing CaffeineCacheManager with spec: maximumSize=1000,expireAfterWrite=5m
